job_tasks.phrase: build delightful features and products for our community, as well as the thousands of companies who trust HackerOne with their cybersecurity posture.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of creating and integrating new functionalities into an existing product, which is a fundamental software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll combine your technological expertise, domain knowledge, and an unquestionable dedication to business objectives as you intersect with the engineering organization.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions aligning technological expertise with business objectives and domain knowledge.

job_tasks.phrase: You identify and make systematic improvements to technical weaknesses you'll find in your squad's codebases, and in shared codebases across the company.
job_tasks.justification: Identifying and improving technical weaknesses in codebases is a core software engineering responsibility related to maintenance and enhancement.
This is a preparatory step for software development work, implying setting up the development environment.

job_tasks.phrase: get to learn the technology stack (Ruby on Rails + GraphQL + ReactJS + many more)
job_tasks.justification: Understanding and working with a technology stack is central to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: will have committed a bunch of code to our repositories and will start developing a knack for being a fast and effective software engineer on our codebase
job_tasks.justification: Committing code and being an effective software engineer directly relates to the core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: will start getting ready to lead your first project as Software Engineer
job_tasks.justification: Project leadership in this context is about managing and executing software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: understand the business value of our products and features, and the needs of our customers
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to understanding business context and customer needs.

job_tasks.phrase: translate feature requests into simple, but robust engineering (or non-engineering) solutions
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of turning requirements into actionable technical plans or implementations.

job_tasks.phrase: Make an impact on a squad and project level.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the contribution and effectiveness within a software development context.

job_tasks.phrase: Coordinate efforts around new initiatives with the senior engineers
job_tasks.justification: This involves managing and aligning tasks within a project, a software engineering responsibility.

soft_skills.phrase: You are a collaborative and effective software engineer and team member.
You will guide and coach the more junior IC's.
developed a good sense of cross-functional collaboration and communication
Execute with excellence. Hold yourself and others to the highest standards of performance
Win as a team. Compete to achieve excellence. Enable each other to do our best
Respect all people. We prioritize diversity, equity, inclusion, and dignity for all

profile.rationale: The job description exclusively details responsibilities related to traditional software development, platform innovation, code quality, and team collaboration. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative AI, LLMs, or any related specialized tasks or technologies. The technologies listed (Ruby on Rails, GraphQL, ReactJS) are standard web development tools. This aligns with the definition of a `Software Engineer` profile, which focuses solely on `Macro-Category A` tasks without AI/ML integration.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is exceptionally clear and detailed regarding the responsibilities and technologies involved. It explicitly defines the role as a "Software Engineer" and focuses entirely on traditional software development tasks, with no mention of AI/ML. This leaves no room for interpretation regarding the profile.
